dialogue.text: Speaking of hopes, I tend to think I can't get past two levels vertically, and three levels horizontally.

visual_elements.evan_gesture: Two fingers right hand, three left

psychological_notes: Evan responds to the architect's dare to go higher by precisely mapping his own metacognitive limits. He's developed a coordinate system for consciousness - vertical (meta-levels) and horizontal (anticipation). The finger counting shows he's seriously calculated these boundaries through experience.
philosophical_underpinning: Consciousness attempting to map its own recursive limits
therapeutic_direction: Client demonstrates sophisticated self-awareness of cognitive boundaries
